Hwi

Introduction

Eun Hwi is a South Korean singer and dancer under P Nation and a member of the boy group TNX. As a trainee, he competed in the SBS survival show "Loud." Through the show, he was recruited by PSY to be a member of the boy group TNX. He made his official debut on May 17, 2022.
